entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low 8.

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm except 20 mm over western sections. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
